title: i bought a skin by accident please help riot
body: riot,  can you please offer me a refund i bought a skin by accident the skin was battle bunny riven: 975rp

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sorry, refunds are not offered even if the purchase is accidental. You're prompted more than once before you purchase a skin, there's no easy way to accidentally purchase content.

You could [use one of your refund tokens](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ#h2q1) to refund the purchase if you have any left, otherwise you're out of luck.

For more information on refunds, see the [Content Refund FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).

>**I ACCIDENTALLY PURCHASED SOMETHING! CAN I HAVE A FREE REFUND?**
We will not provide free refunds for accidental purchases under any circumstances. The only way for you to refund an accidentally purchased item is by using your refund token. When making a purchase, please double check to make sure you are buying your desired item. The store will prompt you to confirm before completing the purchase.

>https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ#h2q4

Hey DragonPower17,

Unfortunately Riot has a strict policy of not giving refunds for "accidental" purchases; people can too easily lie about a purchase they simply regretted getting, and Riot would have to refund everyone if they refunded anyway. You have to rely on your limited Refund Tokens. Read more about their policy here; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ#h2q4

However, you can still make the request through a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Don't get your hopes up too high due to the policy, though.

-DTN
